text: Japanese ornamental dolls, known as hina dolls, are displayed on a seven-metre high pyramid-shaped tiered stand at a shopping mall in front of Konosu Station at Konosu in Saitama prefecture in Japan. More than 1,830 hina dolls donated from across the country are on display to promote the city known as a town of the dolls until March 6.— Photo: AFP
title: Town of dolls
